## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`cargo test --workspace`)
- [ ] Code quality checks pass (`cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets -- -D warnings`)
- [ ] Formatting correct (`cargo +nightly fmt --check`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes (or clearly documented)
